result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon Devon Horton

records.addlTxt:
10:14 AM Defendant Brandon Devon Horton appeared by video.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Brandon Devon Horton.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright in court for the State of Wisconsin. This covers cases 22CF99, 22CT29, 22CT32, 22CT63, & 22CT80.  

22CF99 - Attorney Rockow relates Preliminary Examination is waived.  Court performs colloquy and finds waiver is freely, knowingly, and intelligently given, accepts waiver, and binds over.  

NG pleas are entered in 22CT29, 22CT32, 22CT63, & 22CT80.  

All cases track to 11/18/2022 at 10:00 AM before Judge Babler.  Bond continues. 

*phone number change listed in 22CF99
Arraignment scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.

2:12 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
22CT29, 22CT32, 22CT63, 22CT80 and 22CF99
Warrants quashed.
Covers 22CF99, 22CT32, 22CT29, 22CT63, and 22CT80

THIS BOND COVERS CASES 22CF99, 22CT63, 22CT32, 22CT29 AND 22CT80

THE BONDS IN THE ABOVE CASES ARE AMENDED TO A $500 CASH BOND TO COVER  ALL ABOVE CASES.  THIS CASH BOND AMOUNT IS IN ADDITION TO ANY AMOUNTS ALREADY POSTED.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.
Must not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.

1:11 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brandon Devon Horton appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alex Kitto appeared by video for Brandon Devon Horton. 

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS CASES 22CT63, 22CT32, 22CF99, 22CT29 AND 22CT80

1:12  Court relates and gives appearances.
1:13  State relates and moves for $500 cash bail to cover all above cases.
1:14  Atty. Kitto and Mr. Horton go into break-out room.  1:15 return from break-out room.
Court orders cash bond in the amount of $500 to cover all cases, in addition to any other amounts posted, with existing conditions to continue.

(BOND AND MS SCANNED TO JAIL)
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Body Only - Wisconsin and Adjacent States
Body Only - Wisconsin and Adjacent States

10:13 AM Defendant Brandon Devon Horton not in court.  Attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Brandon Devon Horton. 
COVERS 22CF99, 22CT29, 22CT32, 22CT63 AND 22TR182.
Attorney Rockow relates on the whereabouts of Defendant.   Court orders based on non-appearance for 22CF99 Bench Warrant Body Only Wisconsin and adjacent States. for 22CT29, 22CT32 and 22CT63 Bench Warrant Body Only Statewide.  Court defaults 22TR182 with 60 DTP.

1:05 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brandon Devon Horton appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Brandon Devon Horton for today only.  COVERS 22CT80 (INIT), AND 22CF99, 22CT63, 22CT32 AND 22CT29 (WARRANTS per State).
Court relates Warrants were previously quashed in 22CF99, 22CT63, 22CT32 and 22CT29.  22CT80 Attorney Rockow relates Defendant may qualify. Defendant must call the public defender's office to determine eligibility.  If the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation, the defendant must complete a Petition for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency also known as the blue form in order for the court to consider appointing an attorney.  AIA set and may appear by Zoom.  Attorney Rockow relates.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on June 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.

1:03 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brandon Devon Horton appeared by video.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Brandon Devon Horton. 
COVERS 22CF99, 22CT29, 22CT32, 22CT63.
Attorney Rockow relates on Defendant missing preliminary hearing yesterday due to child support warrant.  Time limits waived.  Court quashes warrant/s.  22CF99 Preliminary Hearing to be set before Judge Babler and Attorney Rockow to contact JA.  Address and phone number confirmed in 22CF99.  Bond continues.
Body only - Wisconsin & adjacent States

2:35 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brandon Devon Horton not in court.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Brandon Devon Horton. This covers cases 22CF99, 22CT29, 22CT32, 22CT63, & 22TR182.  Based upon non-appearance, court issues BW in case 22CF99, body only, WI & adjacent states, and issues BW, body only, statewide in cases 22CT29, 22CT32, & 22CT63. 22TR182 is defaulted.
Preliminary hearing on May 2, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

9:10 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brandon Devon Horton appeared by zoom audio.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Brandon Devon Horton. 
THIS COVERS 22CT29, 22CT32, 22CT63, 22CF99, and 22TR182. 
22CT29, 22CT32 and 22TR182 - Initial appearances. 

22CF99 - Defense requests a preliminary hearing. Court sets preliminary hearing 5/2/2022 at 02:30 PM. May appear by zoom video for prelims. 
All files are set to 5/2/2022 at 2:30 PM. Adjourned initials will be held at this time.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
